    • Interpolating irregular data
  • Changelog

guerrilla

The goal of guerrilla is to provide an easy introduction to interpolation of irregular data. The motivation is to help find a simple answer, not to ensure you do the most rigourous modelling possible (that’s your job!).

We think the tools shouldn’t get in the way of exploring and not everything spatial is geo-spatial.
